phrases: This is your last chance to surrender, Garo!
You are thinking,
This is not how it was supposed to go down, huh?
Well, too bad, hero hunter.
Everyone here is a highly skilled hero who is stared death in the face before.
I brought together the heroes I admire most...
so that we can hunt you!
Highly skilled heroes, eh?
Am I the only one who finds that line funny?
What about all the Class S heroes?
The Hero Association still does not understand how dangerous I am?
You all seem like a hodgepodge I would find in some value pack.
It is not exciting me at all.
So you only pay attention to Class S heroes?
Those Class S heroes sure are popular.
The Hero Association treats them like they are all special, too.
Apparently there are even secret briefings that are only with the Class S heroes.
We are all heroes, so why are we treated so differently?
Because we have rankings, there is a hierarchy,
and there are plenty of talented heroes who go unnoticed.
There are valuable heroes who are not Class S heroes.
That is right.
Since you made a name for yourself by defeating Class S heroes,
you are the perfect target to let the world know just that!
So you did not invite any Class S heroes
because you wanted to make a name for yourselves?
I bet some kids would be disappointed to hear that.
It is hard to breathe...
I am getting dizzy, too.
Is it the poison?
Looks like the Monster Association is causing a fuss right now.
You sure you have time to mess around with me?
Should not you be concentrating on rescuing the hostage first?
Of course, we are going after the Monster Association right after we deal with you.
We will teach all those monsters who are getting full of themselves a lesson.
These guys are a staircase.
They are a staircase I have to climb in order to become a real monster.
I will not go back down!
Looks like the poison's circulated.
You must be reaching your limit.
I will walk over them all, one by one,
and make my way up!
Did you see Justice Man yesterday?
He finally used his new special move!
Justice Fire Kick!
It was so cool!
Also, that one part was hilarious.
When Crab Demon died.
Yeah, the way it reacted when Justice Man showed no mercy to the eggs it was hiding!
Crab Demon put up a good fight, though!
When Mach Woman and Little Justice joined the fight,
Crab Demon had to face all three of them alone, and it still held its own!
What?
Why are you rooting for Crab Demon?
Because Crab Demon just wanted to protect the beautiful ocean!
It was fighting on its own just for that!
If it were just a little stronger, it would have won...
It must have felt so disappointed...
Everyone is Dignity
Now!
Ankle Noose!
Earth Rotation of Doom!
What?
Chain Toad!
He got me!
He is got a blade!
What?
I am not allowed to have one?
Talk about unfair.
He is been shot in one leg, and the poison should be taking effect...
Be careful!
Leave it to me!
Pile Bison!
Get back!
What?
When did
Damn it!
He figured out the timing!
But...
He is wide open from the front!
Shit!
Damn it!
Put me down!
Sing, Bamboo Shoot!
That is half of you.
Death Gatling, it will not be so funny if we all lose.
We should not worry about taking him alive anymore.
Yeah.
He chose that for himself.
He can still move at that speed?
He should be pretty weakened by now,
yet somehow we are on the ropes.
It definitely does not feel like we are fighting a human!
Stinger!
Fight me one-on-one!
Looks like he chose me!
Everyone else, stay out of this!
No!
We all need to
I will fill you with holes!
What?!
Thank goodness Stinger is as stupid as I would heard.
How dare you?!
Out of the way!
I will take care of him!
Garo cannot dodge my fire right now!
Get away from Garo!
Hey, what is wrong?
You sure wanted to get up close and personal earlier.
Do not run away now.
You are making me lonely here!
I cannot get away!
He is...
At this rate...
Now that our formation has been broken, am I just holding everyone back?
This newbie is holding us back.
We should not have to split our earnings with him.
O-Oh, that is fine.
You guys can have it...
It is all over...
I am going to be killed!
I am not cut out to be a hero...
I am just a commoner...
I am at my limit!
Who the heck decides what your limit is, anyway?
If you have the time to break down,
you are better off moving forward.
Back then, I decided that I would change.
Just like him!
If I am just going to be used as a shield, I will fight you head-on
Yeah, there you go.
You can do it.
You are pretty confident in your stamina, right?
You bastard!
It is a trap, Stinger!
Still, I cannot just abandon him!
Gigantic Drill Stinger!
To think you would get rid of your shield yourself...
Now I will not have to worry about others getting caught in my fire.
This is the end, Garo the Monster!
There is a kid inside the shack.
If you shoot from there, he will be caught in the crossfire.
Of all the things you could possibly say...
As if I would believe a cheap lie like that!
Watch carefully.
Witness the moment the monster is victorious!
Justice will prevail.
Die!
Death Shower!
Why?!
Why cannot I hit him?
O-Old dude...
Tch...
Talk about a ridiculous amount of bullets.
There is no point in taking aim again.
I know that was your Death Shower, which requires you to fire all your bullets.
So he was provoking me, as well?
Any monster that attack hits becomes mincemeat...
Or apparently not.
Thanks.
You just proved that firearms cannot defeat me.
This should not have happened, right?
Too bad for you, you stooges.
Guess you should have called for a Class S hero or two, after all.
The situation might have been different if you had even one of them.
Class S, my ass...
Are you telling me every other hero is second-rate?
It is true.
Class S heroes are amazing.
But we are also heroes who are risking our lives to fight!
Look at me!
The one who has the hero hunter cornered
is me, the Class A hero, Death Gatling!
Talk about jaded.
I am going to defeat you...
so I can prove our worth!
The only one who cares about ranks
is you, dumbass!
Pathetic...
You are so pathetic.
O-Old dude...
Oh...
You are still alive.
Hey!
Somebody help!
W-Water...
I came in response to a call for backup.
From the looks of things, you are the hero hunter I have heard about.
I am going to eliminate you.
Machine Gun Blows!
Fist of Flowing Water, Crushed Rock!
Die!
You asshole...
You buried yourself to lure me in.
This man...
was able to dodge immediately by using a leg move
with Fist of Flowing Water, Crushed Rock.
I see.
No wonder he is been giving the other heroes trouble.
Sweet!
I have finally got this!
You have only got a sliver of HP left, King.
Guess I just might be stronger now.
Oh?
You are still going to fight back?
Wait.
Calm down, me.
I just need one more hit and I win.
There is no way he could actually turn the tables at this point
How was that?
I let you think you had a chance.
Did you have a little fun?
I will not let you have the win, but I do not mind letting you have that, at least.
Your moves are way too simple, Saitama.
You end up button-mashing even when you have a chance,
so I can still win, even with my eyes closed.
That makes it 81 wins and 0 losses for me.
You should practice some.
I will let you borrow my console and everything.
Games can be pretty stressful, huh?
You will feel much better when you win one day.
Do not break it, okay?
Hey, that thing's buzzing.
So it is.
Is it a monster?
Good.
Let us go kick its ass!
Looks like some other Class S heroes already headed there.
It is probably over by now.
But that aside, Saitama,
it is really scary that a bunch of monsters are passed out by your house.
That cannot be very sanitary.
I will have Genos set them on fire later.
But anyway, I wonder why so many monsters pop up around here.
City Z's hazardous area ahead Absolutely no trespassing
That is probably why no one lives in this area.
If monsters keep showing up in hordes in multiple cities,
more places might end up like this.
By the way, where is Genos?
Oh, yeah.
He has not been home since yesterday.
Huh?
Is he okay?
Something called the Monster Association apparently showed up.
Maybe someone took him out yesterday...
I am sure he is fine.
He is Genos, after all.
Noodle Soup
Guess I will check it out anyway.
A Class S hero showed up?
Thank goodness...
He is strong...
He is got incredible speed and the same level of power as Tank-Top Master.
He also keeps blasting that heat cannon of his.
He is a pain in the ass to deal with in my current condition.
Damn it...
Give it up.
There is no way you can escape from me.
Those moves...
Remember that guy's moves...
His movement pattern changed.
He is moving on all fours?
Shake.
I have always been pretty good with handling high-tech machinery!
Especially breaking them!
It is no use.
One after another...
Looks like I have caught the attention of all the heroes.
I am glad to be such a celebrity now.
Currently,
the world is in chaos due to the emergence of the evil Monster Association.
Everyone in the Hero Association should be working together to defeat them.
We do not have time to deal with small fry like you.
Who are you calling a small fry?!
Then help me out, Demon Cyborg.
If I take you down, society will fear me more, right?!
Let everyone know that there is no hero who will stand a chance...
Because the ultimate monster is right here!
There is no such thing.
Now!
Back up the hero hunter!
What the hell?
The Monster Association is here.
We have come for you, Garo.
You seem to be in a bit of trouble.
We will help you out.
You dumbasses again?
Good for you.
Not interested.
Get lost.
No, no, we cannot do that this time.
We are under orders ourselves, you see.
No way!
To think that the hero hunter had connections with the Monster Association...
Huh?
I lost yesterday,
but I learned that there are still monsters with powers way beyond my comprehension.
I will never let my guard down again whenever a threat shows up.
Tch.
And today...
I am much stronger than yesterday.
Master Saitama told me to mentally train myself to achieve the height of herodom.
I am just starting to understand what he meant.
This is not enough to defeat me.
Master Saitama?
He is the ultimate hero.
No monster could stand a chance against him.
He actually exists.
Incinerate.
Genos.
Bang?
Do you mind letting us handle this?
Fist of Whirling Wind, Slashing Steel!
Leave the monsters to me, Bang.
You take care of Garo!
Thanks, Big Bro.
Now, then...
Long time no see, Garo.
That voice...
Looks like the geezer who is going to be the biggest pain in my ass is here.
Just look at you...
I will end this now.
Come at me!
Are you strong?
Who the heck is this rude little kid?
This little...
Shall I throw him out?
Nah.
Give him something to eat once he wakes up.
Make sure he gets his fill.
Fist of Flowing Water, Crushed Rock!
Cleaning Up the Disciple's Mess
